author: Debby Detering
content: We enjoyed this truly good news, and the example of a young woman who took advantage of the rigorous training to develop God-given talent and now does performs her duty well in the service of her country and fellow citizens. Bravo!

author: Doug Bostrom
content:
This is the kind of picture that the impoverished imagination of the prejudiced mind can’t produce. But that’s a training problem, amenable to improvement.

Huzzah for Lt. Russell!
